mapper.insert: Insert INTO ADM_FB (FB_NO, FB_CTNT, USR_ID, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID, EV_LV) VALUES (#{fbNo}, #{fbContent}, #{usrId}, SYSDATE, #{usrId}, sysdate, #{usrId}, #{evLv})

insert into ADM_FB_ATCH( ATCH_NO, FB_NO, FILE_NM, FILE_LOC_URL, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{atchNo}, #{czAtchNo}, #{fileNm}, #{fileLocUrl}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
